string.value: It was not an easy fight. Why do they even need this head? What are they going to do with it?
First I have to separate it from the body. It takes some skill.
Done. I can go back, I have the head now.
What's that sparkling? It looks like one of those things the Oracle was talking about!
Got it!
Now I have everything I need. It's time to go back to the Oracle.
The first repair robot is in place. Look at him getting to work!
Now the second repair robot has begun his work. All that's left is to deliver the last one.
The third repair robot is ready! Hopefully, this will help Oracle get his memory back.
What I haven't seen in my travels. Now there's these trails in the crops. Who's leaving them I wonder?
Scientists in Midgard can help me solve this mystery.
It's too narrow. My truck can't pass through here, and it's too dangerous to go by feet.
I need to look for a smaller vehicle. I think I've seen what I need around here.
Thanks to whoever left this car here. I can use it to get into the factory.
I don't think anyone would get offended if I borrow it for a little while. Fuel first, the ignition, the engine!
Woah, this car is fast, damn it!
I have nothing else to do there.
There's the monster. I don't think he'd willingly part with his head, so I'll have to fight.
It's the dangerous enemy, but I can handle him!
I've never seen such a huge ruin before... I wonder what was here before the catastrophe?
The main entrance is blocked, I'll try to drive along the railroad tracks.
You cannot leave this place on this vehicle. It is too dangerous. You'd better use your own truck.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
Improved Storyline||This save is incompatible with the current version of Improved Storyline.||Please start a new game.|
